name: Krishi Shah
title: Data Analyst & Software Developer
shortBio: Turning data into decisions with dashboards, ML models, and scalable code. Software Developer Co-op at Government of Ontario with a passion for building data-driven solutions.
longBio: As a Computer Science student at York University and Software Developer Co-op at Government of Ontario, I transform complex datasets into actionable insights and build scalable applications that solve real-world problems. I specialize in the intersection of data science, machine learning, and software engineering.
